jobDescription: Resource 1 is in need of a Business Analyst for Deerfield, Illinois. Client is open to either contract-for-hire or straight permanent (preference is on CFH). This is an established company with excellent benefits and great growth potential. Perks include bi-annual bonuses, excellent health plan, stock options and competitive salaries. Individual should have at least 5 years of experience working as a Business Analyst and have previous EDI data mapping experience. Client would like an ambitious individual with the aspirations to get more into project management. Any prior experience working as a Project Manager or working with project management software tools would be a plus for this position. Individual will be responsible for implementing and executing the onboarding of EDI clients/trading partners. Individual will get involved in EDI projects from start to finish. Individual will gather the required EDI specifications, file layouts, test data and assist the Programmers in mapping data according to the EDI standards. Individual will gain an understanding of the various EDI formats for specific ERP systems (ie SAP, Oracle Applications, etc.). The majority of the EDI transaction sets are related to Retail & Trucking/Logistics, but some would be related to Healthcare. Prior experience working with TMS (Transportation Management Systems), WMS (Warehouse Management Systems) or POS (Point of Sale) systems is a plus as well. The client is in the process of moving to Agile, so any experience with User Stories, Data Flow Diagrams and Scrum meetings is preferred.  Local candidates are preferred and no third parties please.  Qualified applicants can e-mail resumes for consideration. Technical Skills: Business Analysis, Requirements Gathering/Definition, EDI Mapping/Standards, EDI Specifications, Data Flow Diagrams, Project Management, Client Interaction, ERP Systems, Supply Chain & Retail.
